verbs.description: [ARG0: Rudy Giuliani , a lead attorney for President Donald Trump ,] [V: called] [ARG1: former Director of National Intelligence James Clapper and former CIA Director John Brennan] [ARG2: " clowns "] [ARGM-TMP: on Sunday] [ARGM-CAU: because they have spoken about Russia 's interference in the 2016 U.S. elections] .

Rudy Giuliani , a lead attorney for President Donald Trump , called [ARG0: former Director of National Intelligence James Clapper and former CIA Director John Brennan] " [V: clowns] " on Sunday because they have spoken about Russia 's interference in the 2016 U.S. elections .
